about_the_game:
Wet Passion is a unique puzzle game designed for relaxation and enjoyment. With over 100 unique levels, you will have an exciting journey where you will move the blocks to restore the original images. Each new level presents you with a new challenge and brings you even more pleasure from solving tasks.

Features:

  • Over 100 unique levels: Each level presents a new challenge where you need to move blocks to restore the original images.

  • Engaging puzzle-solving process: Constant changes in level difficulty provide players with variety and enjoyment from solving puzzles.

  • A wealth of captivating images: Restoring images with each new level brings joy and relaxation.

  • Perfect for rest and relaxation: The game is designed with relaxation in mind, allowing players to unwind and enjoy the process without stress.

  • Simplicity and accessibility: Intuitive controls and clear mechanics make the game accessible to all players, regardless of experience.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended exclusively for people over the age of 18. In addition, all the characters featured in this game have come of age.
This game features scenes of a sexual nature and nudity.

name: Wet Passion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1030
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A relaxing puzzle game with 100+ levels that will give you a good mood.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Japanese
